alert.note: Alert for Howell; Oregon; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:29PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Shannon, southeastern Howell and northwestern Oregon Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Plains, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Plains, Mountain View, Thomasville, Peace Valley, Rover, White Church and Teresita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Missouri.
